title: THE.BODYGUARD,1992.PAL.DVDR.MULTISUBS[12] -Lindoff
description:
Description
Frank Farmer, a professional bodyguard, is asked to look into protection for a pop star and her extended family. With grave reservations he agrees to take the assignment refusing to compromise for the sake of her career. After a hostile start the inevitable happens and they fall in love.

Special Features
Interviews, Music Video I Will Always Love You, Theatrical Trailer

Production Year: 1992
